tool_description: This API shows you at least the top 100 cryptocurrencies and allows you to perform analysis on them. Enjoy!
name: Coin MC Analyser
title: Coin MC Analyser

api_list.name: Get All Crypto Currencies With Loss Above Limit Within The Last 7d
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches all cryptocurrencies which values have depreciated above a specified limit (number with 2 decimal places) with the last 7 days
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://coin-mc-analyser.p.rapidapi.com/currencies/7d/loss/2.29"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coin-mc-analyser.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://coin-mc-analyser.p.rapidapi.com/currencies/7d/loss/{limit}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coin-mc-analyser.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Crypto Currencies With Profit Above Limit Within The Last 7 Days
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches all cryptocurrencies which values have grown above a specified limit (number with 2 decimal places) with the last 7 days.

api_list.name: Get Individual Crypto Currency
api_list.description: This endpoint returns more specific but extensive stat data for a particular cryptocurrency.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://coin-mc-analyser.p.rapidapi.com/currencies/bitcoin"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coin-mc-analyser.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Crypto Currencies
api_list.description: This endpoint will return the top 100 cryptocurrencies and their statistics
